name: Ward's Lake
description: A beautiful man-made lake surrounded by a botanical garden.

name: Shillong Peak
description: The highest point in Shillong, offering panoramic views of the city.

name: Nohkalikai Falls
description: One of the tallest plunge waterfalls in India, with a tragic legend.

name: Living Root Bridge
description: A natural wonder, these bridges are grown from the roots of rubber trees.

name: Mawlynnong Village
description: Known as 'God's Own Garden', it is one of the cleanest villages in Asia.

name: Jingmaham Living Root Bridge
description: Another impressive example of a living root bridge.
